posts.postText:
THEY ARE NOW ENABLED.  
Cobblestone duplicators are allowed because you have to manually mine the cobble after in exchange for gold, and that wears down your diamond pick, so the economy won't shit itself.
ANY OTHER TYPE OF EXPLOIT WILL NOT BE TOLERATED AND WILL LEAD TO AN IMMEDIATE 3 DAY BAN.
Update: by duplicator i meant the lava and cobble farm. the piston duplication method itself doesn't work ;)
